name: Google Search +
description: This just makes a few adjustments to the home, search and images pages for google.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info: V1.2 (September 19th, 2018): ► Fixed Dictionary panel. └ When you search "Define [WORD]" ► Changes to certain elements. ► Moved Seperate Search Results into an option. └ For those who don't really like this deisgn. V1.1 (July 5th, 2018): ► Fixed "Google Apps" dropdown menu. ► Fixed Calculator. ► Fixes to google search maps. └ So if you search "LOCATION" to "LOCATION" it won't be all white and broken. ► Fixed some text areas that weren't white. V1.1 (July 2nd, 2018): ► Fixed a lot of shit. Just trust me. Plz

style_settings.label: Fixed search bar to top (Could be buggy)

style_setting_options.label: Yes
style_setting_options.value: .srg > .g, ._NId > .g, #brs > g-section-with-header {background: var(--bg1) !important; padding: 20px 20px 25px 20px; box-sizing: border-box; border-radius: 3px;}
